chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool), lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d m1 m0 -> m0 = m1

Premises:
lemd = fun (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) => ensemble_base state d m0 /\ ensemble_base state d m1 /\ lem m0 m1 : preDTA -> mRelation bool
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
map_or_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> ensemble_base state d (map_or m0 m1)
map_or_mapget_true_rd : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_ld : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
lem_get_leb : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b0 b1 : bool), lem m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some b0 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some b1 -> leb b0 b1
lem_domain_equal : forall m0 m1 : Map bool, lem m0 m1 -> domain_equal bool bool m0 m1
lemd_reflexive : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m -> lemd d m m
map_or_mapget_true_r : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m1 m0) a = Some true
domain_equal_symmetric : forall (A B : Set) (m0 : Map A) (m1 : Map B), domain_equal A B m0 m1 -> domain_equal B A m1 m0
map_or_def_ok : forall m0 m1 : Map bool, domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> domain_equal bool bool m0 (map_or m0 m1)
map_or_mapget_true_l : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
domain_equal_transitive : forall (A0 A1 A2 : Set) (m0 : Map A0) (m1 : Map A1) (m2 : Map A2), domain_equal A0 A1 m0 m1 -> domain_equal A1 A2 m1 m2 -> domain_equal A0 A2 m0 m2
map_or_mapget_true_inv : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true \/ MapGet bool m1 a = Some true
M2_eqmap_2 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m1 m3
M2_eqmap_1 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m0 m2
lem = fix lem (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Prop := match m0 with | @M0 _ => match m1 with | @M0 _ => True | _ => False end | @M1 _ a b => match m1 with | @M1 _ a' b' => if (a =? a')%N then leb b b' else False | _ => False end | @M2 _ a b => match m1 with | @M2 _ c d => lem a c /\ lem b d | _ => False end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Prop
mapcanon_M2_1 : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A m1
map_replace_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (x : bool), ensemble_base state d m -> ensemble_base state d (map_replace bool m a x)
predta_coacc_0_def_ok : forall (d d' : preDTA) (m : Map bool), ensemble_base state d (predta_coacc_0 d d' m)
map_or = fix map_or (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Map bool := match m0 with | @M0 _ => M0 bool | @M1 _ a0 b0 => match m1 with | @M1 _ a1 b1 => if (a0 =? a1)%N then M1 bool a0 (b0 || b1) else M0 bool | _ => M0 bool end | @M2 _ x0 y0 => match m1 with | @M2 _ x1 y1 => M2 bool (map_or x0 x1) (map_or y0 y1) | _ => M0 bool end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Map bool
predta_coacc_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool), ensemble_base state d (predta_coacc d a m)
mapcanon_M2 : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2) -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2)
lem_antisymmetric = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y x0 -> x0 = y) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = y0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => eq_refl) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (H : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) (_ : lem (M1 bool a a0) (M0 bool)) => False_ind (M0 bool = M1 bool a a0) H) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m -> lem m (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = m) (m0 : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m0 -> lem m...
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
Inductive mapcanon (A : Type) : Map A -> Prop := M0_canon : mapcanon A (M0 A) | M1_canon : forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon A (M1 A a y) | M2_canon : forall m1 m2 : Map A, mapcanon A m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2) For mapcanon: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For M0_canon: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1_canon: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2_canon: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
mapcanon_M2_2 : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A m2
lattice_bounded_def_0 = fun p : prechain bool => forall (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p) : prechain bool -> Prop
predta_coacc = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool) => map_replace bool (predta_coacc_0 d d m) a true : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool -> Map bool
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m

```coq
intros d m0 m1 H1 H2.
assert (H3: ensemble_base state d m0) by (apply lemd_ensemble_base; auto).
assert (H4: ensemble_base state d m1) by (apply lemd_ensemble_base; auto).
assert (H5: lem m0 m1) by (apply lemd_lem; auto).
assert (H6: lem m1 m0) by (apply lemd_lem; auto).
assert (H7: domain_equal bool bool m0 m1) by (apply lem_domain_equal; auto).
assert (H8: mapcanon bool m0) by (apply mapcanon_M2_1; apply mapcanon_M2; apply map_or_def_ok; auto).
assert (H9: mapcanon bool m1) by (apply mapcanon_M2_2; apply mapcanon_M2; apply map_or_def_ok; auto).
apply lem_antisymmetric; auto.
Qed.

original: intros d m0 m1 H1 H2. assert (H3: ensemble_base state d m0) by (apply lemd_ensemble_base; auto). assert (H4: ensemble_base state d m1) by (apply lemd_ensemble_base; auto). assert (H5: lem m0 m1) by (apply lemd_lem; auto). assert (H6: lem m1 m0) by (apply lemd_lem; auto). assert (H7: domain_equal bool bool m0 m1) by (apply lem_domain_equal; auto). assert (H8: mapcanon bool m0) by (apply mapcanon_M2_1; apply mapcanon_M2; apply map_or_def_ok; auto). assert (H9: mapcanon bool m1) by (apply mapcanon_M2_2; apply mapcanon_M2; apply map_or_def_ok; auto). apply lem_antisymmetric; auto.
